snippet: The fund foresees global growth of 3.3 percent in 2012 and 3.6 percent in 2013, down from the outlook it offered in July.
abstract: International Monetary Fund cuts its global economic forecasts again, calling the risks of a slowdown 'alarmingly high,' primarily because of policy uncertainty in the United States and Europe; foresees global growth of 3.3 percent in 2012 and 3.6 percent in 2013, down from the July outlook.
lead_paragraph: The fund foresees global growth of 3.3 percent in 2012 and 3.6 percent in 2013, down from the outlook it offered in July.

headline.main: I.M.F. Lowers Its Forecast for Global Growth
headline.print_headline: I.M.F. Lowers Its Forecast for Global Growth
